entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:55 a.m. MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except east 90 gusting to 120 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:53 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except east 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:53 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow late in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h except east 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains in the morning. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:53 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023
